forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 3 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
The evening settles over Downtown San Francisco, a tranquil pause in the rhythm of urban life as the sky dons a cloak of clarity. With temperatures gently dipping to around 50 degrees, a light breeze drifts from the west, whispering promises of a serene night ahead. The marine layer, a staple of this enchanting city, may linger in the distance, but for tonight, it appears to have retreated, leaving stars to punctuate the darkening sky and a sense of possibility in the air.

As dawn unfolds, a bright Saturday awaits, greeting the city with rays of sunshine and a high near 64, inviting all to step outside and breathe in the crisp, invigorating air. The winds, playful yet mild, will caress your skin, providing just the right amount of coolness as the day progresses. Dressing in layers will be ideal for this delightful day; a light sweater or jacket may be precious early on, giving way to comfort as the sun warms the afternoon. Consider visiting a nearby park for a leisurely stroll, discovering new nooks of familiar streets, or sipping coffee at a sunlit café, where the surroundings feel like a scene from a story yet to be written. The charm of San Francisco keeps revealing itself, and today promises to be yet another exquisite chapter.
